Title: Chapter XX: Blind Cannibal Assassins
Writer: Alfred Gough (created by), Miles Millar (created by), Michael Taylor
Actors: Daniel Wu, Emily Beecham, Aramis Knight, Orla Brady
Plot: Sunny and Bajie face off against a deadly new foe with a dark connection to Sunny's past; Chau enlists her brother in the fight against Pilgrim.
